description: Students are exposed to healthcare careers while they examine the science of health and
wellness in relation to self-care, stress-management, sleep, rest, and nutrition. Students learn
about physiological biochemical responses to stress, grief, and loss as well as the mechanisms
of coping. Students use medical terminology in therapeutic communication and explore values
and ethics for collaborative interprofessional practice. An overview of the healthcare system,
holistic care, and evidence-based practice is provided. Counts toward nursing and exercise
